verbose_text: This study was aimed to clarify whether melatonin treatment could inhibit growth and induce apoptosis in FLT3-ITD-mutated AML cells and to determine whether the combination of melatonin and sorafenib has synergistic effects in FLT-ITD AML cells and in mice bearing the FLT3-ITD leukemia model.
evidence: melatonin treatment could inhibit growth and induce apoptosis
